attributes.additional_details: Commit to not undertaking a new national lockdown that World Health Organisation have stated should NOT be used. Lockdowns in 19 areas in the UK have seen cases increase. They're harmful to livelihoods, mental and physical health in the longer term & do not solve the issue of managing Covid 19, merely delay the spread. Currently over 99% of the UK hasn't tested positive and 0.06% dying from or with it. Prioritise, Protect and shield the vulnerable and at risk. No national Lockdowns required.
attributes.background: Following the initial Covid 19 lockdown in March cases of positive Corona virus have increased and this has been reflected in addition deaths mainly in the vulnerable and at risk groups. Lockdowns have proven to be an ineffective and damaging way to manage the outbreak. No more lockdowns.
